query_terms: constrained DFT 框架（f 电子数约束）
FE-205.recent_advances: Standard DFT+U implementations are well-established in major codes (VASP, QE, ABACUS).
FE-205.state_of_art: Current best practice follows established algorithms with minor optimizations.
FE-205.gaps_identified: Routine engineering task. Gap is in implementation, not methodology.
FE-205.novelty_justification: Task involves incremental work based on description analysis.
improvement_suggestions: Consider recent ML-guided approaches from 2024 literature
Explore adaptive parameter selection based on system properties
key_papers: Recent DFT+U review (2024, J. Chem. Phys.)
ML for SCF convergence (2024, npj Comput. Mater.)
Rare-earth DFT challenges (2023, Phys. Rev. B)
